mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num, writer, content, target_num, target_id, ref_group, review_group, deleted, board_food_review.regdate, profile FROM board_food_review INNER JOIN users ON board_food_review.writer=users.id WHERE ref_group=#{ref_group} ORDER BY comment_group ASC, num ASC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_cafe_comment (num, writer, content, target_num, target_id, ref_group, review_group, deleted, regdate) VALUES(#{num}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{target_num},#{target_id}, #{ref_group}, #{review_group},'no', SYSDATE)
